import { useState } from 'react' import styles from '../../styles/User.module.css' const UserSignupForm = ({ closeForm }) => { const [values, setValues] = useState({ name: '', email: '', avatar: '', password: '', }) const handleChange = ({ target: { value, name } }) => { setValues({ ...value, [name]: value }) } const handleSubmite = (e) => { e.prev } return (
Sign Up
